name: Reginaldo Gomes
title: Web Development Analyst | Cloud Computing Specialist
description: Experienced in creating digital solutions with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and Go, utilizing Clean Architecture, SOLID, and DDD patterns. Specialized in AWS Cloud and front-end development.

experience.details: Working on cloud-based digital solutions, focusing on front-end technologies like React, Next.js, and AWS services.
Developed web applications using React.js, integrated APIs, and improved application performance.
